img_summary: The image depicts a torn piece of paper with text in Chinese, likely a formula or recipe related to the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, it is associated with crafting items such as "Tonifying Decoction," "Septenary Heartfire Pill," or "Ascension Powder," which are legendary formulas obtained through exploration or defeating specific enemies. The paper serves as an in-game collectible or crafting guide for players.
